author: Giorgio Ferrarese
description: The distinctive flavours of amaro and gentian dominate this bittersweet but mellow aperitif.
name: Reno
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
5 ml Italicus or other Rosolio di Bergamotto / bergamot liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
